name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior FullStack Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend and frontend development, utilizing a comprehensive tech stack of **Python (Django, Flask)**, **SQLAlchemy**, **OpenAPI**, **Celery**, **RabbitMQ**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, **React**, **TypeScript**, and **GitHub Actions**. Committed to delivering high-performing APIs and scalable services while ensuring agile methodologies and best coding practices are adhered to.
